sections.name: 21K (Half Marathon)
sections.description: A course through Chiang Mai's iconic landmarks and natural beauty, showcasing both historical and modern aspects of the city. No need to worry - the course is completely flat.

sections.name: 10K
sections.description: A scenic loop that includes key cultural sites and parks, designed to offer a less demanding yet equally engaging run. No need to worry - the course is completely flat.

sections.name: 5K
sections.description: Ideal for families and beginners, this route will be through central Chiang Mai, with opportunities to experience the city's charm at a comfortable pace. No need to worry - the course is completely flat.
